title: ADA Payments for eCom and Store
description: eCom stores and Shops lack a efficient ADA Payment Gateway

f6_assessments.q0:
- It's a great solution for payments, although I've seen some lookalike ideas, it is great to have several options in order to make the community grow as a whole.
- In order to make the ADA widely adopted, it's important to have several and different solutions to the public and merchants.
f6_assessments.q1:
- Since it seems that you already have some coins implemented, I do believe that doing it for the ADA won't be a problem.
- An information that should be given is the destiny of the budget asked. There is no info about it.
- Other point that I'm missing is the information about the eCom advertisement. Since the success of the platform is entangled with the usage by the eComs, what is the plan to advertise and how much it's going to cost?
f6_assessments.q2: -Since there is no information about the usage of the budget, there's no way to verify if it's being well aplyed.

f6_assessments.q0: Problem statement being lack of efficient ADA Payment Gateway for Ecom stores the proposer will be integrating ADA into their payment platform which will be helpful for merchants to accept payment in ADA and merchants will be able to easily integrate payment platform with their Ecom stores hence effectively address the challenge

I think that the team has the experience and competence to execute this proposal. Considering the fact that they are just integrating Ada into am existing and running application.
